summary:
**Summary of ASX Announcement (Form 604 - Change in Substantial Holding):**  

• **Substantial Holder:** Host-Plus Pty Limited  
• **Change in Voting Power:** Increased from **10.30%** (39,375,832 shares) to **11.31%** (43,326,823 shares)  
• **Key Transactions (Annexure 1):**  
  - **Large Purchases:** Multiple acquisitions, including a **392,089-share** purchase on **19/06/2025** ($923,085.97)  
  - **Net Increase:** ~3.95 million shares acquired since last disclosure  

**Material Impact:** Indicates continued institutional accumulation, potentially signaling confidence in Nufarm Ltd.  

*(Note: Excludes routine/non-material trades; focus on aggregate ownership change.)*
